Text.val: Program replaces confirmation screens in OSP001C / OSP001C3
14.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
29.11.2012 SH SCR17738 Changed char to graphic in DSQL
31.07.2006 JJ SCR11483 Changed INVO selection to use AINITIAL instead of AACTUAL

SQL_STMT_U.val: select INVO_INVDATE, INVO_AINITIALI, INVO_AACTUALI, INVO_CURRENCY, INVO_SCHEDULEDATE, INVO_SCHTNOCLI,cast( 'Y' as graphic(1)) from :1/INVO where INVO_DEBC_NO =:2 and INVO_INVOICENO = ':3' and INVO_INVDATE = ':4' and INVO_AINITIALI = :5 and INVO_CURRENCY = ':6' union select SCHI_INVDATE, SCHI_INVAMOUNTI, SCHI_INVAMOUNTI, SCHI_INVCURRENCY, SCHT_SCHEDDATDOCUMENT, SCHT_SCHTNOCLI, cast( 'N' as graphic(1)) from :1/SCHI, :1/SCHT where SCHT_NO = SCHI_SCHT_NO and SCHI_INVBOOKED = 'N' and SCHI_DEBC_NO = :2 and SCHI_INVNO = ':3' and SCHI_INVDATE = ':4' and SCHI_INVAMOUNTI = :5 and SCHI_INVCURRENCY = ':6' and SCHI_INVDELETED = 'N' and (SCHI_SCHT_NO <> :7 or SCHI_LINENO <> :8) for fetch only optimize for 100 rows
